description: My place is close to Prospect Park, The Winthrop Stop Subway for the 2 and 5 Train, the Parkside Stop for the Q train. You’ll love it for he vibrant Caribbean neighborhood, the bucolic prospect park, the 20 minute train commute into downtown manhattan, and the quiet and spacious living room.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets).
name: A Spacious and Bright Apartment near Prospect Park
review: The host canceled this reservation 146 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
